snippet.title: Samurai Jet game play trailer (arcade style side scrolling aerial shooter game).
snippet.description:
Quick game play videos from level 1 and level 3. 

Samurai Jet is a side scrolling shoot'em up arcade style game with colorful visuals. Take control of your jet with special abilities such as sword and shuriken strikes to battle an army of enemy flying machines.

Get your free copy here: https://blue-porridge-studio.itch.io/samurai-jet
